item.title: In Venezuela, Which Leader Will Trump Choose?
item.description: Acting President Delcy Rodríguez has the early advantage, but democratic María Corina Machado offers better long-term prospects.

item.title: The Largest Tariffs Are on American Job Creation
item.description: A lesson for 2026: Protectionism delivers economic harm without the promised gains.

item.title: Young Mothers Delivers Europe’s Future
item.description: The Dardenne brothers document social development.

item.title: Does Trump Need a Portrait of James K. Polk?
item.description: If cold-eyed American expansionism is the theme, there are few better representatives than the eleventh president.

item.title: How Iowa Can Defend Property Rights Through Property Tax Reform
item.description: Governor Reynolds understands that the only way to protect homeowners is to limit local governments’ spending.
